double.label: Sigma1
double.description: Sigma value in physical units (e.g., mm) of the Gaussian kernel for smoothing

double.name: sigma2
double.label: Sigma2
double.description: Sigma value in physical units (e.g., mm) of the Gaussian kernel for needle thickness

double.name: anglethreshold
double.label: Angle Threshold
double.description: Threshold for angle from Normal Vector (deg)

double-vector.name: normal
double-vector.label: Normal Vector
double-vector.description: Normal vector for base needle orientation

integer.name: numberOfBins
integer.description: This is an advanced parameter. The number of bins in the histogram used to model the probability mass function of the two intensity distributions. Small numbers of bins may result in a more conservative threshold. The default should suffice for most applications. Experimentation is the only way to see the effect of varying this parameter.
integer.label: Number of Histogram Bins

integer.name: minimumObjectSize
integer.description: Minimum size of object to retain. This parameter can be used to get rid of small regions in noisy images.
integer.label: Minimum Object Size

parameters.label: Needle Identification Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for Needle Identification using PCA

float.name: minPrincipalAxisLength
float.description: Minimum length of the principal axis of the needle artifact.
float.label: Min. Principal Axis Length

float.name: maxMinorAxisLength
float.description: Maximum length of the minor axes of the needle artifact.
float.label: Max. Minor Axis Length
